title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 196.19 - Revocation of course approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 196.19 - Revocation of course approval

State Regulations

The Department of State may revoke approval of any course
or deny the renewal of any course: (a) which fails to comply with any of the provisions of this Part; or
(b) where the sponsor has obtained, used, or
attempted to obtain or use, New York State Department of State security or fire
alarm system installer examination questions; or
(c) where students of any approved course
have demonstrated, during any annual period, a performance record substantially
below the statewide average for first time examination candidates. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
196.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
